::Ramulus::

The bushes rustle as Ramulus walks into the clearing, stopping near Lunarpine 
and Shadow Wing, his gun ready to fire on a newcomer. His eyes narrow as he 
sees Ramhorn being held up by Unitron and Shuko, then widen as he hears 
another bot screaming at Unitron.

"What's she doing?" he says to Lunarpine and Shadow Wing, "Is she insane?!"
